text: Dozens of United Airlines passengers claim they saw Jay - Z shapeshift into a reptilian as the rapper and music mogul travelled between New York City and Los Angeles on Friday. One witness, writing about the experience on Twitter, said “ the shit hit the fan in business class ” when Jay - Z “ lost control ” and began shapeshifting in front of the other business class passengers. “ V scary. He kept changing shape. He knew more and more people were watching and he got angrier and angrier when he couldn ’ t stop. ” At one point, just before the plane began it ’ s descent, Jay - Z scuttled off to the bathroom, where he spent “ at least 10 minutes, ” according to another eyewitness, before emerging with a pale, drawn
